```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)

people <- read_csv("data/people.csv", show_col_types = FALSE) |>
  arrange(role_order, name)

knitr::kable(
  people |> select(name, role, period, interests, email),
  col.names = c("Name", "Role", "Period", "Interests", "Email")
)
```
